titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Shirley A. Stevens report on Charlotte Louise Plummer Owen

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Shirley A. Stevens report on Charlotte Louise Plummer Owen

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.scopecontent: Report prepared for Daughters of the American Revolution Women in American History, honoring Master Technical Sergeant Charlotte Louise Plummer Owen, conductor of the Marine Corps Women's Reserve Band during World War II. Copy print portrait is included.
